0x0000015c.description: Boot value for the Bulk Bar 0 (ARM soft reset loads this value into Bulk Bar 0)
0x0000015c.name: BulkBar0Boot

0x00000160.description: Boot value for the Expansion Bar 0 (ARM soft reset loads this value into Expansion Bar 0)
0x00000160.name: ExpansionBar0Boot

0x00000164.description: Boot value for the ARM MPCoreCfg (ARM soft reset loads this value into MPCoreCfg)
0x00000164.name: MPCoreCfgBoot

0x00000180.description: ARM sidedoor ram ce for core rams
0x00000180.name: SidedoorCECore

0x00000184.description: ARM sidedoor ram ce for L2 cache rams
0x00000184.name: SidedoorCEPl310

0x0000018c.description: ARM sidedoor ram write data lo (bits [31:0])
0x0000018c.name: SidedoorDataWriteLo

0x00000190.description: ARM sidedoor ram write data hi (bits [63:32])
0x00000190.name: SidedoorDataWriteHi

0x00000194.description: ARM sidedoor ram be (bit enables) and we (write enables) for core rams
0x00000194.name: SidedoorBECore

0x00000198.description: ARM sidedoor ram DCTL for L2 cache rams
0x00000198.name: SidedoorDCTLPl310

0x0000019c.description: ARM sidedoor ram we for L2 cache rams
0x0000019c.name: SidedoorWEPl310

0x000001a0.description: ARM sidedoor ram read data lo (bits [31:0]) for core rams
0x000001a0.name: SidedoorCoreDataReadLo

0x000001a4.description: ARM sidedoor ram read data hi (bits [63:32]) for core rams
0x000001a4.name: SidedoorCoreDataReadHi

0x000001a8.description: ARM sidedoor ram read data lo (bits [31:0]) for L2 cache rams
0x000001a8.name: SidedoorPl310DataReadLo

0x000001ac.description: ARM sidedoor ram read data hi (bits [63:32]) for L2 cache rams
0x000001ac.name: SidedoorPl310DataReadHi

0x00800000.description: MP Core CSR base address (see notes 1 and 2)
0x00800000.name: MPCoreCSRBase

0x00a00000.description: PL310 CSR base address (see notes 1 and 2)
0x00a00000.name: Pl310CSRBase

0x00020000.description: Shared Memory ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x00020000.name: SharedMemECCControl

0x00030000.description: L2 Data Cache ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x00030000.name: L2DataCacheECCControl

0x00040000.description: L2 Tag Cache ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x00040000.name: L2TagCacheECCControl

0x00050000.description: L1 Data Cache 0 ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x00050000.name: L1DCache0ECCControl

0x00060000.description: L1 Data Cache 1 ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x00060000.name: L1DCache1ECCControl

0x00070000.description: L1 Data Cache 2 ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x00070000.name: L1DCache2ECCControl

0x00080000.description: L1 Data Cache 3 ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x00080000.name: L1DCache3ECCControl

0x00090000.description: L1 Instruction Cache ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x00090000.name: L1ICacheECCControl

0x000a0000.description: L1 Data Tag Cache ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x000a0000.name: L1DTagCacheECCControl

0x000b0000.description: L1 Instruction Tag Cache ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x000b0000.name: L1ITagCacheECCControl

0x000c0000.description: L1 Dirty ECC Monitor XPB Address Map
0x000c0000.name: L1DirtyECCControl

fields.description: MPCore0 Debug Request (Write 1 to initiate debug request, cleared by HW on DBGACK from ARM)
fields.name: DbgReq

fields.description: MPCore0 Debug Enable
fields.name: DbgEn

fields.description: CSR WFE event trigger
fields.name: WfeEvtTrg

fields.description: ETM WFU Ready handshake response (active low)
fields.name: EtmWfiReady

fields.description: ETM interface power on (to MPCore)
fields.name: EtmPowerOn

fields.description: BIST Fail status from DAL
fields.name: BistFail

fields.description: BIST Done status from DAL
fields.name: BistDone

fields.description: BIST Run
fields.name: BistRun

fields.description: MPCore0 commrx_cpu0.
fields.name: commrx_cpu0

fields.description: MPCore0 commtx_cpu0.
fields.name: commtx_cpu0

fields.description: MPCore0 smpnamp.
fields.name: smpnamp

fields.description: MPCore0 pwrctl.
fields.name: pwrctl0

fields.description: MPCore0 wfe.
fields.name: wfe

fields.description: MPCore0 wfi.
fields.name: wfi

fields.description: MPCore0 l2_idle.
fields.name: l2_idle

fields.description: BAR type
fields.name: BarType

fields.description: CPP command target ID
fields.name: Target

fields.description: CPP command token
fields.name: Token

fields.description: CPP command length increment
fields.name: Length

fields.description: CPP master command bus preference
fields.name: Preference

fields.description: Bits [39:29] of CPP command address.  Bits [28:0] of CPP command are taken from the AXI command address.
fields.name: Address

fields.description: This bit is set to indicate the configurater completed the configuration process.
fields.name: CfgCompleted

fields.description: This field indicates the error type for the second image copy.  Only valid if CfgCompleted is set.
fields.name: Cfg2Err

fields.description: This field indicates the error type for the first image copy.  Only valid if CfgImage is set.
fields.name: Cfg1Err

fields.description: This bit is set if the configurater successfully completed the configuration process.
fields.name: CfgSuccess

fields.description: Zero indicates the configurater suceeded using the first image.  One indicates the first image failed and the second image was used.
fields.name: CfgImage

fields.description: BAR type
fields.name: BarType

fields.description: CPP command target ID
fields.name: Target

fields.description: CPP command token
fields.name: Token

fields.description: CPP command length increment
fields.name: Length

fields.description: CPP Command Action Encoding
fields.name: Action

fields.description: Bits [39:25] of CPP command address.  Bits [24:0] of CPP command are taken from the AXI command address.
fields.name: Address

fields.description: Bits [39:22] of CPP command address.  Bits [21:0] of CPP command are taken from the AXI command address.
fields.name: Address

fields.description: CPP command posted
fields.name: Posted

fields.description: CPP command signal ref
fields.name: SignalRef

fields.description: CPP command data master
fields.name: DataMaster

fields.description: CPP command data ref
fields.name: DataRef

fields.description: CPP command target ID
fields.name: Target

fields.description: CPP Command Action Encoding
fields.name: Action

fields.description: CPP command length
fields.name: Length

fields.description: CPP command byte mask
fields.name: ByteMask

fields.description: CPP command token
fields.name: Token

fields.description: CPP command signal master
fields.name: SignalMaster

fields.description: Select RMII TXD[1] or SMII TX_SYNC signal onto GPIO[31]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_31

fields.description: Select RMII TXD[0] or SMII TXD signal onto GPIO[30]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_30

fields.description: RMII TX_EN signal onto GPIO[29]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_29

fields.description: RMII RX_ER or SS_TX_CLK signal onto GPIO[26]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_26

fields.description: Select Serial_Activity_1 signal onto GPIO[23]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_23

fields.description: Select Serial_Activity_0 signal onto GPIO[22]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_22

fields.description: Select Uart1_TxDo onto GPIO[21]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_21

fields.description: Unused. Uart1_RxDi maps in from GPIO[20]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_20

fields.description: Selects GPIO[19] to be ArbOut for NCSI/RMII. Use standard GPIO[19] OE.
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_19

fields.description: Unused. NCSI ArbIn maps in from GPIO[18]
fields.name: Gpio_Sel_18

fields.description: This register provides a jump to self instruction to the arm core when the configurater process fails and the arm is spun up for the arm JTAG to come in and program the configurater flash.
fields.name: JumpToSelf

fields.description: Base address for CSRs in MPCore
fields.name: BaseAddress

fields.description: L2 Cache big-endian.
fields.name: PL310_Cfg_Bigend

fields.description: L2 Cache ID.
fields.name: PL310_CacheID

fields.description: NMI configuration.
fields.name: ARM_Cfg_NMI

fields.description: MP0 endianess
fields.name: MP0ConfigEndian

fields.description: MP0 Reset Vector location
fields.name: MP0RstVecLoc

fields.description: MP Output clock enable
fields.name: MP0OutClkEnable

fields.description: Base address for CSRs in PL310 L2 Cache
fields.name: ARMClusterId

fields.description: Base address for CSRs in PL310 L2 cache
fields.name: BaseAddress

fields.description: Expected return signal ref for signal B
fields.name: SignalB

fields.description: Signal B data bus
fields.name: SignalBBus

fields.description: Expected return signal ref for signal A
fields.name: SignalA

fields.description: Signal A data bus
fields.name: SignalABus

fields.description: Set to '1' by hardware when Signal B received and the appropriate [Pull|Push]_Signal_Nosplit is active, cleared on CSR write.
fields.name: NosplitReceivedB

fields.description: Nosplit B and Signal B received will terminate a command waiting for both signals.
fields.name: NosplitEnableB

fields.description: Set to '1' by hardware when Signal A received and the appropriate [Pull|Push]_Signal_Nosplit is active, cleared on CSR write.
fields.name: NosplitReceivedA

fields.description: Nosplit A and Signal A received will terminate a command waiting for both signals.
fields.name: NosplitEnableA

fields.description: Set to '1' by hardware when Signal B received, cleared on CSR write.
fields.name: SignalBReceived

fields.description: Value in Signal B field is valid and must be received to complete cmd.
fields.name: SignalBValid

fields.description: Set to '1' by hardware when Signal A received, cleared on CSR write.
fields.name: SignalAReceived

fields.description: Value in Signal A field is valid and must be received to complete cmd.
fields.name: SignalAValid

fields.description: Command complete, set to '1' by hardware when all valid signal(s) received, cleared on CSR write.
fields.name: CmdComplete

fields.description: SPI external device virtual address space
fields.name: ExtSpiDevAddrSpace

fields.description: This field controls the ram ADDR pins for the arm core and L2 cache memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorAddr

fields.description: This bit is set to write enable sidedoor access into the arm core memories.
fields.name: SidedoorCoreWE

fields.description: This field controls the bit enables for the arm core memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorCoreBE

fields.description: This bit is set to enable sidedoor access into the arm core memories.
fields.name: SidedoorCoreEnable

fields.description: This field controls the ram CE pins for the arm core memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorCE

fields.description: This bit is set to enable sidedoor access into the arm L2 cache memories.
fields.name: SidedoorPl310Enable

fields.description: This field controls the ram CE pins for the arm L2 cache memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorCE

fields.description: This register returns ram read data (bits [63:32]) for the arm core memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorDataRdHiCore

fields.description: This register returns ram read data (bits [31:0]) for the arm core memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorDataRdLo

fields.description: This field controls the data read muxing for the arm L2 cache memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorPl310DCTL

fields.description: This field controls the ram write DATA pins (bits [63:32]) for the arm core cache memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorDataWrHi

fields.description: This field controls the ram write DATA pins (bits [31:0]) for the arm core cache memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorDataWrLo

fields.description: This register returns ram read data (bits [63:32]) for the arm L2 cache memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorDataRdHiPl310

fields.description: This register returns ram read data (bits [31:0]) for the arm L2 cache memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorDataRdLoPl310

fields.description: This field controls the ram write enable pins for the arm L2 cache memories during sidedoor accesses.
fields.name: SidedoorPl310WE
